localString.value: The sarcophagus' heavy lid is fashioned from unadorned stone.
The sarcophagus' heavy lid is fashioned from unadorned stone.
An indecipherable message is scrawled on the tombside in fresh blood. You wonder what undead lord calls this sarcophagus his home.

The sarcophagus' heavy lid is fashioned from unadorned stone.

The sarcophagus' heavy lid is fashioned from unadorned stone.
A tarp extends to protect this pile of bloated corpses from the sun.
The brazier gives off a hot glow. As you reach toward it, you can feel beads of sweat forming on the palm of your hand.
